DOC.brief_summary: Supplementation DHA pregnancy increase gestational length improve cognitive development .
DOC.detailed_description: This trial supplementation DHA pregnancy increase gestational length . Subjects provide 300 mg , 600 mg placebo ( olive oil ) randomize design week 24-26 pregnancy delivery . Gestational age , birth weight birth length data collect infant growth 2 4 month cognitive development 4 month 1 year measure .
